question: What is the return policy for Amazon?
full_response: Explore the About Amazon Returns page below for more information. You can also initiate a return through the Return Items You Ordered link.

question: Do you offer free shipping on all items?
full_response: Explore the About Amazon Returns page below for more information. You can also initiate a return through the Return Items You Ordered link. Free shipping is offered on eligible items that meet the stated minimum order value threshold. Orders shipped by Amazon within 24 hours of a qualifying order also receive free shipping. Certain items shipped to Alaska or Hawaii may not be eligible. International free shipping is available to eligible countries for orders meeting the minimum amount of eligible products.

To clean your Kindle e-reader, gently wipe the screen with a soft, lint-free cloth. Avoid using household cleaners or solvents, as these could damage the device. If needed, you can lightly dampen the cloth with water. For stubborn spots, use a screen cleaning solution designed for electronic devices. Be cautious not to get moisture in any openings. When cleaning, remove the cover and power off the Kindle.
